meanings.definition: To prepare or process (food) in its natural state without cooking or heating.
meanings.sent1: I prefer to rawin my vegetables for a fresh and crunchy salad.
meanings.sent2: She likes to rawin fruits for a healthy snack.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to rawin the ingredients for a unique dish.
meanings.sent4: The idea to rawin the fish before serving was a stroke of genius.
meanings.sent5: Rawin your food to retain all the nutrients and flavors.

meanings.sent5: The rawin materials were perfect for the rustic design.

meanings.definition: A tool used for drawing or marking lines.
meanings.sent1: She used a rawin to draw straight lines on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The artist's favorite rawin was a fine-tipped marker.
